pullRequest.title: FirstOf: added extra-ctor
pullRequest.bodyText:
This pull-request has no corresponding issue.

Added extra-ctor with default condition (always true) to FirstOf

nodes.bodyText: @iakunin let's also add a constructor that takes a T to ease use, WDYT?
nodes.diffHunk:

+     */
+    public FirstOf(final Iterable<T> src, final Scalar<T> fbck) {

commit.message: FirstOf: adding another ctor (default condition and plain T fallback)

nodes.bodyText: @iakunin can you just add one test for the empty iterable version?
